title: Product Rule of Exponents
text: For any real number a and natural numbers $$m$$ and $$n$$, the product rule of exponents states that $$a^m a^n=a \left(m+n\right)$$.
speech: For any real number a and natural numbers  m  and  n , the product rule of exponents states that , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to a, parentheses m plus n,  .

, the product rule of exponents states that  , a to the m-th a to the n-th is equal to a,  m plus n,

title: Product Rule of Exponents
text: Use the product rule to simplify the expression: $$x^2 x^5 x^3=x^{2+5+3}$$
speech: Use the product rule to simplify the expression:  x squared x to the fifth x cubed is equal to, x raised to the 2 plus 5 plus 3 power
